dict.acceptation: 机会；适当的时机良机；有利的环境，条件；

sent.orig: An optimist see an opportunity in every calamity, a pessimist see a calamity in every opportunity.
sent.trans: 乐观者从灾难中看到良机，悲观者从良机中看到灾难。

sent.orig: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; sees the opportunity in every difficulty. " 1"
sent.trans: 3“悲观者认为每一个机会都是困难的；乐观者认为，机会在每一个困难中。”

sent.orig: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
sent.trans: 悲观者在机会中看到困难；乐观者在困难中看到机会。

sent.orig: Are you opportunity after opportunity because you can't recognize a crossroad when you come to it?
sent.trans: 你一再错失大好良机，是不是由于走到了十字路口，而自己总是浑然不觉？

sent.orig: Yet opportunity alone is not enough to create success. Opportunity must be seizedacted to have value.
sent.trans: 然而只有机会并不能获得成功，而必须抓住机会，见机行事，创造佳绩。
